tool_description: Performs comparative analysis between products, time periods, or customer segments to identify performance differences and competitive insights.

primary_dataset.description: Primary dataset of review IDs for comparison

comparison_datasets.description: Additional datasets to compare against primary

comparison_type.description: Type of comparison: product, temporal, segment, competitor

metrics_to_compare.description: Metrics for comparison: rating, sentiment, volume, keywords

statistical_tests.description: Whether to perform statistical significance tests

error_messages: Empty datasets: Primary and comparison datasets cannot be empty
Invalid comparison type: Use one of [product, temporal, segment, competitor]
Invalid metrics: Use combination of [rating, sentiment, volume, keywords]
Insufficient comparison data: Need at least one comparison dataset
Dataset size mismatch: Datasets too small for meaningful statistical comparison
usage: Provide primary dataset and comparison datasets, specify comparison type and metrics. Returns comparative analysis with statistical insights.

metric_differences.description: Quantified differences for each compared metric

rankings.description: Relative rankings of datasets across compared metrics
